qas.question: Who is viewed as the first modern geologist?

answers.text: Earth must be much older than had previously been supposed

qas.question: When was the Royal Society of Edinburgh founded?

qas.question: What was the theory the Royal Society presented?

plausible_answers.text: in order to allow enough time for mountains to be eroded and for sediments to form new rocks at the bottom of the sea

qas.question: Why did the Royal Society think the Earth was older than previously thought?

plausible_answers.text: to allow enough time for mountains to be eroded and for sediments to form new rocks
